metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49006 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Phpsysinfo version 3.4.3allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information via a crafted pagein the XML.php file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpsysinfo - 3.4.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpsysinfo package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.3-1').
